bioconda.name: bioconductor-geosubmission
bioconda.summary: Prepares microarray data for submission to GEO

biotools.summary: Helps to easily submit a microarray dataset and the associated sample information to GEO by preparing a single file for upload (direct deposit).

bioschemas.name: GEOsubmission
bioschemas.summary: Helps to easily submit a microarray dataset and the associated sample information to GEO by preparing a single file for upload (direct deposit).
